articles.description: 《胡飞瞳：零知识证明将渗入到 Web3 的每一个角落》零知识证明是一种密码学方法，允许一方（证明者）向另一方（验证者）证明某些信息是真实的而不提供任何额外的信息。其效率和性价比还有待从工程和方法上大大提升。这两个方面都取得实质性的突破，那么整个互联网的去中心化时代就来到了。

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Seems important

Mike Benz: Benz: “The Treasury will reply to Saudi Arabia ending the Petrodollar by heavily pushing crypto stablecoins like Tether & Circle.”
*3 days later*
Wall Street Journal, full page spread: “Treasury must promote crypto stablecoins like Tether & Circle to save us, now!!’”
articles.title: Seems important
